name: My Fabulous Kingdom
description:
Game available in English or French

This is a good day! Your father just died, letting you access the throne and rule the country.

In this game, made for the adaptive music jam, you will have to listen twice and take decision once. You will be listening to both your people and the echoes of your kingdom.

Be wise, and you may find the perfect balance between your happiness and the will of the people.

Made by LaJack, Scriptopathe & DoubleSept


The king is dead, long live the king!
